#include <bits/stdc++.h>

using namespace std;

long long Mult (long long a, long long b, long long c)
{
	long long x = 0, y = a % c;
	while (b)
	{
		if (b & 1)
			x = (x + y) % c;
		y = (y << 1) % c;
		b >>= 1;
	}
	return x;
}

bool Solve (long long n, long long b)
{
	long long p1 = 1, p2 = 1;
	for (int i = 2; i <= n; i++)
	{
		p2 = Mult (p2, i, 2LL * b);
		p1 = p2 % b;
	}
	return p1 == p2;
}

int main ()
{
	int T;
	long long n, B;
	scanf ("%d", &T);
	while (T--)
	{
		scanf ("%lld %lld", &n, &B);
		if (n <= 1 && B == 1)
			printf ("Odd\n");
		else if (Solve (n, B))
			printf ("Even\n");
		else
			printf ("Odd\n");
	}
	return 0;
}
